targets.query: SELECT last(/^.*usage.*$/) FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last(/^.*usage.*$/) FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv),1s) AS "in_pps", non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent),1s) AS "out_pps" FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$interface$/ AND "interface" != 'all' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), interface

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv),1s) AS "in_pps", non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent),1s) AS "out_pps" FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$interface$/ AND "interface" != 'all' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), interface

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv),1s) AS "in_pps", non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent),1s) AS "out_pps" FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$interface$/ AND "interface" != 'all' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), interface
SELECT ("Free_Megabytes" + "Percent_Free_Space") FROM "win_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total")-last("used") AS "fres" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("pct_util") FROM "disk" WHERE "device" = 'sda' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("await") FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "device" = 'sda' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv),1s) AS "in_pps", non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent),1s) AS "out_pps" FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$interface$/ AND "interface" != 'all' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), interface
SELECT last(/.*_memory_rss$/) FROM "mpx_procstat" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last(/^.*usage.*$/) FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv),1s) AS "in_pps", non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent),1s) AS "out_pps" FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$interface$/ AND "interface" != 'all' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), interface

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv),1s) AS "in_pps", non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent),1s) AS "out_pps" FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$interface$/ AND "interface" != 'all' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), interface
SELECT ("Free_Megabytes" + "Percent_Free_Space") FROM "win_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total")-last("used") AS "fres" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("wkB_per_s")  * 1024 AS "write (b/s)", mean("rkB_per_s")  * 1024 AS "read (b/s)" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "device" = 'sda') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device" fill(null)
SELECT last(/^.*usage.*$/) FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "host" WHERE (agent = 'on'  AND osname = 'windows')
